title: Neighborhood care economy includes middle-aged leadership
description: Neighborhood care economy includes middle-aged leadership
content:
Scenario: Neighborhood care economy includes middle-aged leadership
    Given Robert has decades of life experience
    And he has accumulated professional and personal capabilities
    And he's positioned to contribute neighborhood leadership
    When neighborhood_elohim recognizes his leadership potential
    Then it should surface leadership opportunities appropriate to his capacity
    And connect him to neighborhood governance roles
    And recognize his care contributions as qualifying him for leadership
    And help him balance leadership with his existing demands
    And prevent overcommitment that would overwhelm him
    And channel his capabilities toward neighborhood improvement
    And build neighborhood leadership from accumulated care experience
